caption.p: Geographic location of the Krasnoyarsk Krai. The geographic location of the Krasnoyarsk Krai on the right (highlighted in dark gray) and adjacent areas: Kemerovo Oblast, Novosibirsk Oblast, Tomsk Oblast, Altai Krai, and Irkutsk Oblast. Cities of Krasnoyarsk Krai (Krasnoyarsk and Norilsk) are highlighted, as well as the territory (light circle) where circulating HIV-1 was studied (left).
